blogPost.title: What is the future for influencer marketing? Answer by @Gachoucha, Marketing professor Fashion, Luxury and Brand @HECParis. https://t.co/Y42eqmdDwo https://t.co/BhBTFqeIWy
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 影响者营销的未来是什么？回答者：@Gachoucha，市场营销教授时尚、奢侈品和品牌@HECParis。https://t.co/Y42eqmdDwo https://t.co/BhBTFqeIWy。
影響者營銷的未來是什麼？回答者：@Gachoucha，市場營銷教授時尚、奢侈品和品牌@HECParis。https://t.co/Y42eqmdDwo https://t.co/BhBTFqeIWy。

previous.title: What is the future of home delivery? Answer by Jack Simms, COO at @homevaletco. https://t.co/lJduxuxcE4 https://t.co/tDZHXmFxqB

家庭快遞的未來是什麼？由@homevaletco首席運營官Jack Simms回答。https://t.co/lJduxuxcE4 https://t.co/tDZHXmFxqB。

next.title: What is some good career advice for members of Gen Z, as they enter the working world? Answer by @RobKingyens, Founder & CEO at https://t.co/FmvM87BDuS. https://t.co/l1X7tMYeeO https://t.co/EX2q8vLIKK

localize.full_text: 对于Z世代的成员来说，进入职场，有什么好的职业建议？回答者：@RobKingyens，创始人& CEO，地址：https://t.co/FmvM87BDuS。https://t.co/l1X7tMYeeO https://t.co/EX2q8vLIKK。
對於Z世代的成員來說，進入職場，有什麼好的職業建議？回答者：@RobKingyens，創始人& CEO，地址：https://t.co/FmvM87BDuS。https://t.co/l1X7tMYeeO https://t.co/EX2q8vLIKK。
